meanings.sent1: The pond is fishable, so we can catch fish there easily.
meanings.sent2: The lake is fishable, attracting many anglers on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The fishable waters were so full of fish that even the birds were jealous!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like fishable gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The fishable stream glistened with the promise of a good catch.

meanings.sent1: The calm river is fishable, perfect for a relaxing fishing trip.
meanings.sent2: The clear waters of the bay are fishable all year round.
meanings.sent3: The fishable boat was so comfortable, it felt like a floating fishing paradise.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed across the fishable lake, carrying the joy of a successful catch.
meanings.sent5: The fishable dock provided a peaceful spot for anglers to enjoy their hobby.
